issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
In KitchenSink, in Platform>Filesystem, The application crashes with a runtime error on launching the filesystem JS. Please see the attached file for console output.


Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS with 1.8.0.1
2) Navigate to Platform>Filesystem

Result:
KS Crash

Expected:
Filesystem loads and functions without error

Note:
Does not occur with 1.7.5 GA
fields.summary: Android: getDirectoryListing - v8/rhino - Illegal argument exception and crash

comments.body: can not reproduce with the latest master

Verified as Cannot Reproduce.
SDK: 1.8.0.1.RC3
Android Runtimes: V8/Rhino
Studio: 1.0.7.201112152014
OS: OS X Lion
Devices Tested: Nexus One 2.2.2, Xoom 3.2.1 (as per Thomas)
